forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 69. Southwest wind 5 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
Tonight in Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a light warmth, settling around 54 degrees as twilight casts a serene glow over the cityscape. With a gentle southwest breeze whispering at 6 to 9 mph, there’s a comforting calmness accompanying the night, further enhanced by a patchwork of clouds quietly drifting above. As the world winds down, the city begins to unveil its illuminated charm, inviting an exploration of its neighborhoods beneath a partly cloudy sky.

Tomorrow promises clarity and sunshine, a welcome embrace for those eager to soak in a high near 69 degrees. The mild southwest winds may pick up later, refreshing the air with gusts that flirt with 21 mph, invigorating the spirit of the day. While fog may grace the edges of the coastline, most of the city will bask in the warmth, the playful shadows weaving through the streets. Ideal attire will be comfortably layered, perhaps a light jacket for the cooler moments, allowing for ease as one ventures out to enjoy various delights in this vibrant city. With such splendid weather, consider indulging in a stroll through the parks or discovering a tucked-away café, each moment a small celebration of what San Francisco has to offer as the hours roll by.
